name: RunningZombie
description:
This game was made by me after learning Unity for 2 and a half months. For half a month, I learned by doing. But the game still has some bugs. I hope these bugs will not affect your playing this game.

I don't know if this website can load this game. If you can't load it, you can go to this URL: https://github.com/Roooobot/Running-Zombie-Game

The following is the key description of the game:

Move: W,A,S,D

Attack: Press the left mouse button

Interaction: E

Skill: f (Press f when the human is shooting or fleeing, and then click the human with the right mouse button. Press f again to cancel the skill.) This skill can control other zombies to attack the designated human.

You can equip items from your backpack, or go to the store to buy healing potions.
